com.baasbox.android
Class BAASBoxApiException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.baasbox.android.BAASBoxException
              com.baasbox.android.BAASBoxApiException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BAASBoxClientException, BAASBoxInvalidSessionException, BAASBoxServerException
public class BAASBoxApiException
extends BAASBoxException

This class extends BAASBoxException. This is the root of all the exception thrown by the remote server; if it crashes or the request made is invalid, a subclass of BAASBoxApiException is thrown by the SDK.

Author:
Davide Caroselli
See Also:
